sys_script_include.description: Handles the 'checkout' button event. Creates a record on the Order Table, and then creates records on the Order Item table using the Order table record id.
sys_script_include.name: Create Order Records

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_5217275dc0d202107f441432a4fe9cf9
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_cdltd_dropship_0.Create Order Records</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Handles the 'checkout' button event. Creates a record on the Order Table, and then creates records on the Order Item table using the Order table record id.</description><name>Create Order Records</name><script><![CDATA[var CreateOrderRecords = Class.create();
CreateOrderRecords.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

    createOrder: function() {
        var orderGR = new GlideRecord('x_cdltd_dropship_0_orders'); // Replace 'u_orders' with your actual Orders table name
        orderGR.initialize();
        orderGR.setValue('product_id', 'test'); // Replace 'product_id' with your actual field name
        orderGR.insert();
    },

    type: 'CreateOrderRecords'
};
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>adam.botens</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-20 15:00:40</sys_created_on><sys_id>5217275dc0d202107f441432a4fe9cf9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Create Order Records</sys_name><sys_package display_value="DropshipNow" source="x_cdltd_dropship_0">c50b38615cbd02107f44e00391646b2b</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="DropshipNow">c50b38615cbd02107f44e00391646b2b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5217275dc0d202107f441432a4fe9cf9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>adam.botens</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-20 15:30:21</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
